original_text: He longed to fill his stomach with the pods that the pigs were eating, but no one gave him anything.
korean_text: 그가 돼지 먹는 쥐엄 열매로 배를 채우고자 하되 주는 자가 없는지라

sentences.original_text: He longed to fill his stomach with pods
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 배를 꼬투리로 채우고 싶어했다

sentences.original_text: but no one gave him anything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 그에게 아무것도 주지 않았다
